Title: Notes to the consolidated financial statements continued

Subtitle: 9. Finance income and costs

Table:
- Column headers: Finance income, Bank deposits, Hedge ineffectiveness, Total finance income
- Row headers: 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 2021, 2020, 202
